content.detailedDescription:
On this day, 04/08/2015 i was working the night with my partner at the service station when we noticed a growing noise too loud and strong (like a jumbo), come see what it was but there was nothing in the sky, seemed to be floating, delizando down on the sky, as it was night did not see anything, only that loud sound like that of continuous propoulsão, we realize that continued as straight and disappearing slowly, very slowly, we saw some object but the sound was very strange. it was like a very large object itself was low flying around straight.
we were many curious and try to follow to see if we could exergar something, but nothing was seen.
that sound was in my mind long after also feeling that we were unprotected and defenseless. i do not know what houvimos but airline know it was not.
we were so intrigamos that not even think about trying to record audio.
content.summary: I realized that as a very large object delizava over sky with a very high continuous sound.

content.detailedDescription: At 11:05 last night i was out in my front yard saw a dim star like object north east of abilene tx. wasn't sure if it was moving , it looked like it ejected a smaller light that circled it a few times. at that moment i saw a flash . it was a little more north of the  first object. so i stared where i thought i saw a flash. a second later i saw another flash then another . it was random flashes not a pattern. then out of the south or south east heading north came a dull red or pinkish almost asteroid looking object . it went straight to the object that had flashed and was  now dim and hovering . as soon as it reached it at higher speeds than conventional aircraft that we think we know of fly. it suddenly reversed and went straight back the way it came . i turned and watched it till my house and trees blocked my view. instantly something said look up. not a voice, just my inner voice . so i looked straight up and the saw a flash then another. then nothing and out of the east going west came a dim glowing green object and it too went straight to where this flash was and before it reached it , i mean up to it . it reversed course and went back east .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4-6 ufos

content.detailedDescription: Doing this i was in bed a bright light came threw my window so bright that it hurt my eyes dogs was barking like something was not right i got up grab my phone and went out side as i was outside i notice a fallen like star objective it stop in mid air start moving from side to side then the object started coming do to earth and it got bigger and landed and a human like figure got out caring another a smaller human like figure in his chest it look at me and i took a photo of the figure it got back in the object and flew back in the ski.
content.summary: Came in as a light like a star and landedd

content.detailedDescription: It was almost 11:30pm on may 23rd.  i was fishing at my usual spot alone and on a nice night looking over the shipyard.  at this time of night even with the businesses across the river the nights sky gets dark and crisp, it was a calm and quiet night.  as i sit there fishing i tend to look around and take in my surroundings while relaxing by myself and nature.  this is when out of no where about 8 or so lights just appear across the river.   when they appeared my first thought was birds getting the light refelcted and i just didn't notice them, however i was quickly realizing they were not birds.  the lights darted around in no particular fashion, weaving in and out of themselves as incredible speeds up down left right diagonal all over the place.  i froze and just stared in awe, i was scared to grab my phone in fear of them disappearing when i looked away. luckily for me they did not.  i began recording (and not all the lights show up in the videos but multiple ones do) at this time it's pretty windy and i'm just watching these lights cut through the night sky.  at one point about 4 lights split off from the group and go to the left side of the shipyard dancing around and flying at incredible flight movements.  i was so shocked by what i was seeing u can even hear in the videos that i can't get a full sentence out. this goes on for about 4min the four lights meet up with the other lights bob around for a few seconds then vanish as quick as they appeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 6/8 lights darting around

content.detailedDescription:
Bonsoir l'ã©quipe mufon,

novembre 2010, france.

je ne travailler pas et je me passionnã© sur les ovni et surtout l'astronomie ce qui me fessait passer des heures entiers dehors a regarde les ã©toiles. j'ã©tait ã©loignã© d'une dizaine de mã¨tre de ma maison et en rentrant chez moi sur mon chemin je ne fessait pas attention a ce qui avait autours de moi, lorsque je me suis rapprochã© de ma maison a environ 3/4 mã¨tre , je vois ma maison ãªtre ã©clairã© comme si on venã© d'allumã© la lumiã¨re. une lumiã¨re de couleur bleu claire/foncã© vient d'ã©clairã© la faã§ade avant d'un seul coups.
pã©trifiã© sur place, sur ma gauche je ne pouvais pas voir d'oã¹ elle venez car un arbre m'en bloquã© la vue, mais a en jugã©, je voyez bien que cela venã© du ciel car l'ombre de l'arbre ã©tait sur ma droite et cachã© ma propre personne.. cela n'a durã© que quelque minutes et lorsque j'ai eu le courage de vouloir regardã© ce que c'ã©tait, tout avait disparu. 
au loin je voyã© un point blanc ce confondant avec les ã©toiles bougã© de l'est au nord si je ne me trompe pas et a une vitesse lente, mais cela je ne sais pas si sais liã©e ou non.

je me suis senti mal et observã© presque tout le reste de la nuit, je suis restã© quelque minute dans mon salon sen bruit et choquã© de c'ã©tait situation, je n'y croyais pas, mais le lendemain tout allez pour le mieux.

merci d'avoir pris le temps de lire ce message et sa fait du bien de pouvoir en parler a des gens qui ne ce moquerons pas de mon rã©cit. 
pardon pour les fautes de grammaires, je suis minable en franã§ais.

bon courage a vous et a toute l'ã©quipe du mufon.
content.summary: Enorme lumiere bleu eclerant toute ma maison sur plus de 100 metre

content.detailedDescription: Went to work was reviewing last nights security camera footage when at 6:25 a bright glowing object flew from the west into the camera frame and hovered in the iron gate to the small engine yard where i work it then flew to the back of the yard and then it did some s turns flew to the back of the yard then back to the gate and hovered some more then it flew straight up and out of the camera to return again and hover in the gate {there are two cameras they criss cross each others view one was in color the other was in infrared and black and white u wouldn't have noticed it in color but the black and white is a sight to behold this was a lengthy viewing u can come see for yourself in the color side you can see 2 raccoons dodging this thing as it was trying to get them this went on for 5 to 8 mins they where dodging and it was chasing then it flew out of camera sight to reappear again the is all recorded on security cam please contact me for viewing  no bs  this is the second time ive seen strange things here at this location the first was a ufo right above me in 2012 or 2013  all so made a report to mufon you requested an personal inveiw then and after this youll get it in the color side you cant see it but you can see it passing threw the fence trying to get the coons this yard has lawn mowers stacked on top of each other 3 to 4 feet high so for you or i to walk there is very difficult and this thing was zipping around all this junk like it wasn't even there
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orb was trying to get 2 racoons in the back of our place of buisness it on security cam and saved its the strangest thing iv ever witnessed racoons running back and forth with a bright orb chasing them

content.detailedDescription:
1. rollerskating on the street with 2 other witnesses.
2.All light in the entirely neighbourhood went out 30 secs before and a loud engineering sound like ive never heard befor made us look up.
3.Ufo
4.The buildings in the street are 5 storyes high and directly above us a large ufo passed over us. afterworths when i came home my bigbrother told me he had been listning to the local radio and the had reported a sudden loss of power in the entirely neighbourhood of copenhagen v.
5.Something extraordinary had happened to me and my 2 friends, that was what i felt like.
1 of my friends had told me years later that he had a similar sighting of a identical but smaller ufo at broad daylight, where he felt observed.
6. it dissapeared out of sight because of the buildings.

the date is very uncertain.
content.summary: Very close encounter

content.detailedDescription: This was about 20 years ago; i was at my house in beaver, pennsylvania with a friend on a summer night 1995 (approximate date). our other friend showed up at my house on his bike saying that he just saw some fire trucks with their lights on so we should go check it out. we jumped on our bikes and quickly rode towards our school near gypsy glenn road because that is where he last saw them going. we saw some lights that we thought could be the trucks way up on the hill but then they flew over the hill out of sight. we thought, "oh it was just a plane" and turned around. we were half way across our practice soccer field when we turned around and rode back towards my house. we only made it to the parking lot/tennis court area when we stopped because there were 3 objects flying toward us in a formation. the objects had 3 white lights on them, which stayed constant, they did not blink. they were far off at that point, maybe 1 or 2 miles and first i thought maybe they were planes, but the lights seemed odd. they were also in formation, which was unusual. then the 2 on the sides flew off at an incredibly high rate of speed in what had to have been a 90 degree angle, both going in opposite directions. that is when we became frozen and speechless out of fear and amazement. we knew we were really seeing something uncanny here. the object in the middle continued to fly directly at us, going at a slow rate of speed. too slow to stay airborne i thought. now we got a better look at the object. we could see that the 3 white lights were at each corner of the object, making a triangular shape. really the 3 lights were all i could see, the object was so dark i could not make out the exact shape even as it flew overhead very low, only 50 to 100 feet. it continued overhead, not off to the left or right, directly over our heads. today that is the fact that bothers me the most. whatever it was had to have seen us, or was aware of our presence. throughout the whole experience, even when it was directly above us, the objects made absolutely no sound. the object kept flying on the same path at the same speed over our school and over the hills out of sight. now we began to talk again, yell actually as we were very excited, confused, and a little scared because we really did not know what we just witnessed. we know we all saw the same thing, and my two friends would corroborate my story if you were to ask them today. after it was gone we kept riding our bikes around my neighborhood there by the school with our eyes to the sky. there was a lot of air traffic that night, much more than usual, but none of those objects came anywhere near as close as the other 3. all the objects in the sky that night did appear to start going in the same direction, but i’m not able to say for certain which were planes and which were ufos. i can say with 100% certainty that these 3 objects i just described were ufos, as there is no object i am aware of that can fly with those varying speeds or fly that silently. excited we finally rode back to my house where we told my mother what we had just seen. she did not give it a second thought, dismissing it saying that it was a plane. i have talked about this event a lot over the years, but have never reported it officially. i will never forget it though, and i will never stop searching for answers. i think this is the right thing to do and i hope that my story is helpful in some way. obviously, the truth is out there.
content.summary: Three triangular shaped objects fly toward us. two of the objects fly off at right angles. one object flies directly overhead making no sound.

content.detailedDescription: This is not a normal sighting report, more of a request to investigate a strange structure. as the attachment will show, there is a large lava like tube running beneath the surface of puerto rico. what drew my attention were the 3 right angle turns in the tube that is otherwise very straight and uniform in construction.  at the northern most point there is a very dark straight line across the entire tube.  all of this appears to be man-made to look like a natural structure.  although there are no other tubes in the area and lava doesn't flow in strait lines, rather follows terrain. i you are looking for a candidate for an underwater base, i think is is a good start.
content.summary: Google surfing underwater structures

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my driveway and noticed some nice cloud formations and thought that they would make good screen savers for my computer. i got my camera and took the first picture of a cloud and checked it out on my digital camera. i noticed the house roof line was showing in the picture so i took the second one, about a minute later, wanting to just have the cloud visible. i preceded to take additional pictures of plants/flowers around my house. it was'nt until i downloaded the pictures to my computer that i noticed the object in the second picture. i did not see it at the time i took the picture. to my amazement this object appeared. it looks like a ufo.
content.summary: Taking pictures with camera

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were cutting someone's grass and the mower stopped.We checked the sparkplug and my friend pulled the cord and it shocked me he left and it was still daylight, but the next thing i remember is it was dark and i looked up and saw the object in the sky over me and to the right. i have had many dreams about this over the last 46 years and i was watching a show about people being hipmatized and they could remember or give more details about what happened. i know i was on the object and remember light and shapes but not much more. if there is any way you can help me would be very much aprechated.I still have dreams about it and sometimes can't sleep at night because of this thing that happened to me so many years ago.The last thing i remember is the craft moving off slowly with the lights going round and round on the bottom of the craft. all i can really be sure about is that i was by the lawn mower after being shocked and it was daylight and when i saw the craft i was still in the same place but it was dark outside. i have been confused about this all my life and wonder if i have been conducted more than once in my life and the dreams i've had are real and not just dreams. leading to me not being able to sleep after i am put back in my bed. can you help me? after this happened i started drawing the head of an unusual shape that i can reproduce at any time and i had never drawn anything like it.I know i was only about 10 years old but i still remember like it was yesterday. i was never scared or remember being hurt in any way. but i know what i saw and i don't understand why i would start drawing a head that looks very much like a gray. i was 10 and didn't even know what a ufo was much less what they would look like.Thank you
content.summary: Looked somewhat like lost in space sausar

content.detailedDescription: I had just gotten off work and was driving to my house, when i got close to my house i saw light but assumed it wasn't anything. then i see my house and above it the enormous ship the lights were dull as if the ship was powered down or idle, almost hiding. i pulled in my driveway, directly under the ship now. i look up and there was a window were two or three figures appeared to be talking/arguing with each other and one looked down then the ship did some weird maneuver then vanished. i've had multiple encounters and one psychology abduction from a ufo.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Big star wars like star destroyer looking ship.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i decided to sit at the beach in one of the lifeguard chairs on the water just to enjoy the night . after talking for a while he pointed out a very bright basketball sized light in the sky . it wasn't moving ! it wasn't a plane . it just stood there . we ignored it and continued speaking when we randomly decided to check on it . it was gone. that was only in about a minute , it appeared like a blink in another spot much further from the original. it was to the left of us and than appeared right in front of us again, further away . how ever this time it was reflecting on the water . it would dissapear.... completely and then reappear . weird . we didn't think much about it .... today i thought i should share . there weren't any noises . looking at the pictures now it looked disfigured with other colored lights around it almost as squiggles . it dissapeared soon after . the first picture came out normal , as a circle .
content.summary: Sitting on the beach with boyfriend . saw a very bright lightly that wasn't moving . pretty far into the sky .. dissapeared and than reappeared in another spot

content.detailedDescription: Yellow-green fireball fall from the sky
content.summary: Meteorite

content.detailedDescription:
In the early 1980's i was employed at arnold engineering and development center as a security policeman. this us government testing center is located just outside of tullahoma, tn.. and is located adjacent to a wildlife preserve so at 1+ am in the morning it's pretty dark. the highway is approx. 12 miles in length and is for the most part lined on both sides by towering pine trees which lends it's self to what i describe as providing a shotgun view from the drivers seat. there are numerous dips but fairly few curves in this highway and a few side roads. as i remember there are three personnel gates to the center all on the left. one of the main side roads sort of tees into the access highway from the right that is road that employees from winchester, tn. use. when approaching this road the highway makes a fairly sharp left curve and opens up to where it is about 200 feet open areas on both sides of the highway. so that area opens up to where ones sight lines are vastly improved for several hundred yards.
    anyway,....On this night i was on my way into work at about 1:15 in the am, after having pasted gate 2 and a small construction gate the highway makes a small gradual dip then rises into the few hundred yards to the winchester access road. just at the lowest part of the dip the night, which was almost pitch black, the night instantly lit up like a cloud less mid summer day. i saw a huge brilliant circular orb of light approx 100 ft above the pine tree tops just passed the far side of the left curve and just beyond the winchester access road. it was so bright i could not see into this orb. i could not see what was emanating the light. it projected solid shadows, was totally silent and moved from a position on my left toward my right a cross the winchester road kind of like a hot air balloon might in a stiff breeze. the orb moved through my sight line in approx. 3.5-6 seconds. at the time i jumped on my accelerator to get to the tee in the road and look toward winchester. it took maybe another 6-10 seconds to do that and when i looked,...It was no longer there, pitch dark again. i had several co workers that had their own experiences at the center. i got into work a short time later and told my supervisor what i had experienced and he said, 'do you what to make a report' i said no because i had no proof. if one takes the time you can find these roads and highways on google earth or any map app. 
 i want to thank cassidy nicholas for encouraging me to follow thru and submit this report,....Thanks cassidy,....
if interested i can provide maps, sketches or a verbal interview,....And that to mufon for all you folks do.
content.summary: Brilliant circular light approx. 300-500 ft dia. moving silently from a 9-3 o'clock pos for 4-6 seconds

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were hanging out in my backyard during the summer.  it was mid day afternoon, but the sun was still high in the sky.  i can't remember who noticed them first, but we saw 5-8 orbs in the nnw sky over the mountains.  i ran inside and told my cousin to come to see them.  to her dismay, she also confirmed the sighting.  we teased her a lot back then, so she thought we were messing around, but she did see them for herself.  the orbs were star like in size and appearance, however it seemed odd because it was a sunny near cloudless day in the middle of the afternoon, and we could see them very clearly.  the orbs ranged in color from red to orange, green, blue, and white.  i might add; this location in which my parents still reside is about 5 miles or less south of the rocky flats nuclear weapons production facility.  these orbs, though seemingly high in altitude appeared to be hovering either directly over the facility, or just to the west of it over the mountains.  the facility is right against the foothills, so it was hard to tell.  the orbs were arranged in a circular, star, or octagonal pattern.  they would stay in formation for 15-45 seconds, then all would come together to a focal point, then disappear.  they would re-appear within 5-10 degrees of the previous location, again in a circular or octagonal pattern and repeated this over the next 15-30 minutes.  eventually they stopped re-appearing one by one until they were all gone.  i have heard stories of similar sighting, so even after all this time i wanted to share this, because it is one of the most vivid memories i have as a young man.  my friend and i still talk about it to this day.  my cousin moved away, but i'm sure she would be willing to corroborate this sighting.  we were all very perplexed, and didn't know what to think about it.  i think we partly didn't really talk a lot abut it back then because the 90's still held a negative stigma about ufo sightings.  but after hearing stories of other sightings, i am confident we witnessed and extra terrestrial, extra dimensional, or government black ops event.  that is just speculation, however before or since that day, i have never seen stars so bright in the middle of the day, nor have i seen them arrange themselves in a pattern, then disappear, and re-appear repeatedly.  thank you mufon for everything you do.  we will find out eventually!
content.summary: 5-8 orbs disappeared/re-appeared over the mountains in the nnw sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was with my family at frontier days and i was sitting with one of my grandparents, while one of my parents was looking around the things to buy at the indian village and i heard as always the big c-130s taking off nearby, because the air field in just across the park. i was looking up at the sky for awhile taking in the beautiful day and that's when i noticed a smooth surfaced, thin, slow moving, silver disc moving realitivley slow at a 45 degree angle upwards. at first i could see it clearly for ten seconds or so and then it ascended behind the clouds and i could see a glimpse of it and then before i knew it, it was gone. all the while while i was watching it move upwards i felt though as if i was locked into watching it and everyone and everything else around me was gone until it disappeared.
content.summary: It moved very slow for a few seconds then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: When coming home from work i saw a ufo when i was getting on the 184hwy exit from the 58fwy. i made a video for you to scrutinize. i hope that you can expand the video and change the lighting and all that stuff so we can see the ufo better thanx
content.summary: Saw ufo on my way home from work took video

content.detailedDescription: Three of us were sitting on the front deck and saw this bright light, just  blow  the clouds. there was a moon that night. as we watched this very bright light just under the clouds, it started emitting and receiving smaller bright orbs of bright white objects. upon dawn, it changed directions to the right and to the left, extremely fast, and suddenly went straight up into the clouds and disappeared when the sun started to rise on the horizon. this was observed by all of us for 3-4 hours.
content.summary: A bright light rejecting and accepting smaller bright lights that remained for several hours then suddenly at dawn disappeared into the clouds

content.detailedDescription: First, i must apologize. i wish me and my subordinate had a specialized camera to have a close-up of this object. at the moment, we are on guard duty and noticed the object approximately 00:00. and for a duration of 75 minutes, we witnessed this object appear within an approximate 16-20 miles from our location: 31 degrees 8 minutes 38.328 seconds n 97 degrees 47 minutes 5.82 seconds w. throughout the 75 minutes, we have guessed that the object is spinning, zig zagging across the sky, changing its color and traveling in a wnw direction slowly away from the fort hood military reservation. by the naked eye, we conclude with the fact that this object has gone far as lampasas county (and still going). at one point during the 75 minutes, we thought that the object was heading toward our direction but did not. the lights were impressive as it was very bright. too bright to be an aircraft. the angle of our observation was at 35-45 degrees and at the end, it was a lot lower given the distance. this observation is a continuing trend of sightings that has been going on this whole summer.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: The continuation of ufo sightings from fort hood

content.detailedDescription:
Was just looking up and saw this light much higher than the planes in the flight path.  the light would zig zag and then pulsate. seemed to stay in a primary spot. thought maybe a star or plane but it was definitely significantly higher than the planes. the zig zagging was the weird part
watched for about 15 minutes. i was in south corona, ca about 8:45pm and watched until 9:00pm on august 5, 2015
content.summary: Very high in sky, flashing light and zig zags

content.detailedDescription: The object was round would dim, brighten, and disappear, and reappear at times then it moved to the west and took off north
content.summary: Observed a bright light dimming and brighting and staying stationary and moving and disappearing at times in the span of an hour

content.detailedDescription: I was at the beach with family and friends and took a couple pictures of the sunset with my phone. in the last picture i caught a large sun-like orb just south of the sunset and above the peninsula, which was at a higher elevation than our sea-level location. i did not see the orb with my eyes. when i checked the photo and saw the orb in the picture, i looked up but didn't see anything in the same location. i've seen ufos (to me) all my life, so catching one on camera without actually seeing it was a little disappointing.
content.summary: I took a picture of the sunset west of spanish banks beach. when i looked at the picture, it had a large orb south west of the sunset, visible above the peninsula.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and i stepped out side to have a cigarette. its a clear night stars are shining and the moon isn't bright out. i always look up at the sky and stare at the stars. as i'm looking to the west in the sky a light appeared out of know where. i knew right then that's no plane or helicopter. there was no sound at all, and it couldn't have been more than a mile above me. as it hovered the light got brighter and brighter then shot off to the northwest. it took about 3 seconds for the light to get brighter. as soon as it took off the light turned off and didn't stay on. i would've liked to have watched it for a bit longer. i've seen up to five red orbs only about 150' foot above a field once before and it went on for about 30 minutes. my family and i watched as they darted around the field. hovering and stopping then they joined as one red orb and shot up to the sky. ever since then i'm always watching the sky. i look forward to when ill see something strange again.
content.summary: A light appeared hovered the got really bright and shot off to the northwest never saw anything like it 5lbs

content.detailedDescription: Me and a friend were delivering newspapers around 4:15 am.We were just starting the paper route and were on our bmx bikes in front of my house. seen what we thought was a shooting star. coming from the east. fast and silent. it came to a complete stop over an area in re woods behind my house that for some reason never grew much bush or grass or whatever.It was like a big circle with no trees were we use to ride our bikes. that's where the red fire ball orb thing came down and was hovering right below tree level for about 15 minutes. then it slowly started moving straight up. then shot off to the west so fast and with no sound . it was as big as a house .But round and looked like a huge fire ball. never seen anything like it again .And can't stop wondering and wanting to know what that was we saw that morning . i drive by that area all the time to remember. somebody built a house on that exact place the fire ball was hovering . and it still looks like nothing grows there . i've been tempted to go speak to the owner of the house .But assume they would just think i was crazy and call the police on me...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Me and a friend were delivering newspapers and seen a fire ball come down and hover over the woods for 20 minutes

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside at 4:00 am, i had let my dog out so that he could go to the bathroom before we both went to bed. he is very sick, and he would not go out until i went outside with him. the sky was very clear and still, with no noticeable wind or cloud cover whatsoever.
i then spotted an object in the sky that was highly unusual, and not at all like the normal airliners that overfly my house, which is located in the flying lanes of detroit metropolitan airport which is located just south of me in wayne county.
th object was located around a mile or two away from me and at 45 degrees of elevation, just south west of my position. if i faced directly south, the object was located 15 degrees to my direct right, and it was flying very slowly at almost a walking pace. it was flying on an unwavering and steady course of west to east at an estimated altitude of around 8000 feet, give or take a few thousand feet, and it was flying at an altitude of much less that than half way up in the air than a normal airliner would be flying at if it were flying at the normal cruising altitude that i always see airliners overflying my home.

the object was not emitting any sound whatsoever that i could detect over the background noise of the freeway that is very near to my home, and at that late hour, traffic on this freeway was almost non existent, so there was very little if any background noise to be heard. 

the craft was very much unlike any airliner, for example a 767 jet, in that it had four steadily glowing white lights, of which one was in front, one was at the rear, and one each was located at the midsection on either side of the object, and it had a red light that flashed or strobed very intermittently and very seldomly, where sometimes seconds would go by before the light would strobe, and the strobing intervals were very random. the red strobing light was located right in the middle of the bottom of the craft. this was the only spot where the red light would strobe from.
the craft also had a white light that strobed very infrequently, and very randomly, and i also believe that the location of the strobing white light varied as to it's position on the craft. this white strobing light was also very random as to the periods when it would strobe, and sometimes seconds would go by before it would strobe again.

the craft had a very distinct and pronounced outline that was definitely not like any airplane that i have ever seen, nor was it a helicopter or any other type of light aircraft. i have seen all types of aircraft in existence at this time, including classified military aircraft, and this did not resemble any of them either. the craft was also not a drone of any kind.

when i spotted the ufo, after i just stood there and observed it for a few uninterrupted seconds, i came to the definitive conclusion that i was looking at something highly unusual that i had never seen before.
i then ran into my home, grabbed my video camera, and ran back outside to take a video of the ufo while i turned on my video camera and opened up the tripod that i had the camera mounted to.
i had been outside two nights before to take video footage of the unusually bright and large full moon that was present at that time, and the weather was unusually clear and quiet, so i did take some superb video footage and photos of the full moon with my camera mounted on a tripod. that is why my video camera was mounted on a tripod and ready to shoot video at the time of this incident.

it took me 3 or 4 minutes just to get my video camera, run back outside, turn on the camera and extend the tripod and then run to the fence on the side of my property, and then finally get the camera focused onto the object. it took me another minute to get the object in my camera's sights, get the video camera and tripod combination balanced against the wooden privacy fence that borders my property, and then get the craft into good focus. by that time, the object had passed by my location and was now just south southwest of my position. i started taking some good video footage with the object in good focus and zoomed in, an by this time i was filming the left side and rear of the craft. the good quality video lasted for about two minutes, and after that, i lost the object in my video camera's screen because the object had passed behind a branch of a large tree that is located adjacent to my property in my neighbor's yard.
i tried to re-acquire the object in my camera's viewfinder screen, but because of the fact that my video camera is not especially good at taking night time video, i could not find it again. 
i then ran through the back gate of my house to the front of my house, and then i ran to the corner of my street, located directly to the right of my home and one house away from me, so that i could obtain an unobstructed view to the east of my location all the way to the horizon, and the ufo had completely disappeared from my view.
the ufo had to have either turned off all of it's exterior lighting, or it had to have sped away from my location at a very high rate of speed, because it had only taken me about a minuet from the time that i lost the object in my camera's view screen, to the time that i had arrived at my street's corner, for the object to completely disappear.

when i had first spotted the big and very visible ufo, there was another object flying directly in front of the larger and more visible ufo, and it was located a couple of miles in front of it, directly in the ufo's flight path. this other flying object was visible only as an intermittently strobing white pinpoint of light, which had no other visible lights at all on it's exterior, and it had no visible shape to it as well.
content.summary: Ufo spotted flying slowly from west to east with random flashing lights - have video

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the road on the passenger seat. all of a sudden i look out the windshield and my father (driving) and i see lights. there were about 7 bright orangish yellow lights in the sky. they looked like about the size of a baseball in the sky. the lights were loosely clustered. there many other planes in the sky that night. all of a sudden, the loose cluster of lights got closer and then just disappeared.
content.summary: I was driving down the road when i saw these lights in the sky and then they disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: On 08/01/2015 at approx 10:29 my boyfriend shawn bradshaw and i were outside his house taking videos of the lightning in a storm that was approaching.While we were taking the videos we did not see the ball of light it was observed the next day while i was reviewing the videos.I took the videos while facing northwest at the back of the house.There is a farm field and woods there their are no home or street lights or any other kind of lights there.I have attached both videos and 3 still shots from the first video. i contacted our local tv station to ask their weather staff whether they thought this could be ball lightning or something else they did not respond.I am pursuing this with you because clearly lightning hit the ball of light twice it seems way to big in comparison to the lightning to be a plane.We at first thought it could be a light reflection caught on the camera but again clearly reflections don't get hit by lightning.What did we catch on film can you help with an answer thank you scarlett adkins
content.summary: Took videos on phone of ball of light being struck by lightning

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend at the time, her 2 kids and i were coming from dinner and driving down the street when she noticed the huge lights in the sky. at first it looked like a planet but it was to big, to bright and there was 3 in a perfect vertical line. then while we were driving 3 other lights appeared that dimmer-ed on in a pattern and then we noticed 6 huge lights that made an enormous perfect triangle. i was to stunned to get my phone out to take pics and a video. all 4 us were watching for a good 5 mins till we made a stop then the lights dimmer-ed in a specific pattern off. i realized it was gone and i had no evidence!
content.summary: Huge triangle 6 light perfect formation with lights that dimmer-ed on and off in a pattern

content.detailedDescription:
While camping at gooseberry campground we were looking for satellites using night vision glasses at approximately 11pm. we had seen a number of satellites that night and were surprised to see a bright flaring star-like object in the south vectoring towards us and away from the moon. we thought it was a plane initially but it was clearly in space, had no flashing lights or coloured lights. 

the 1st vehicle vectored from the moon position silently towards us from the south and brightened dramatically on approach. as it faded a few seconds later to our surprise a second vehicle appeared on the same trajectory which brightened, faded and fell in behind the 1st vehicle. both vehicles proceeded nose to tail for 30 seconds at a speed faster than a satellite towards the nw and suddenly disappeared before hitting the horizon. that was odd as well because we are used to tracking satellites to 30 degrees above the horizon. we were using night vision to track them until they disappeared. a clear night, no wind and no noise was heard.
content.summary: Space vehicles in trail formation
